ygData.subject: Re: I really wanted to...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hahahah.  I am going to prove myself as one of these annoying people and ask you this: Do you follow your own rules? I don t care one way or the other if
ygData.messageBody:
>From: Rakim2001@...
>
>I really wanted to stay on this list and learn about tinkering but this is
>damn pathetic. We got people who make arrogant comments and then the
>people
>who are even dumber are the people who fill up ur mailbox with complaints
>about one single email and turn it into a big event or something. I wanted
>to share knowledge about tinkering and be taught knowledge but this list
>keeps going in circles. If you are sending something that you would not
>want
>in ur mailbox then ur just messed up. Think about it as if someone was
>sending YOU an email that said "screw that" and that's it. It would piss
>you
>off. And it has pissed me off. So I am leaving this list until the people
>on it can learn to respect the power over other peoples mailboxes that they
>have.
>
>Holy paladin of the 20th season.
>
>Rojer Wilco

Hahahah. I am going to prove myself as one of these "annoying" people and
ask you this:

Do you follow your own rules?

I don't care one way or the other if you stay or leave. So why did you
post?

Oh yeah, if I stated before that the bait was nontrivial, I was mistaken.
Forgive me for being illiterate.

Phenglei of Erollisi Marr
